content: Fix sections.go - add abbreviation field to INSERT
Fix users.go - remove deleted_at, adjust column names
Fix addresses.go - remove address_complement, adjust column names
Fix schools.go - use 'school' table, adjust column names
Fix items.go - remove thumbnail, adjust column mapping
Fix authors.go - legacy uses first_name/last_name, new uses firstname/lastname
Fix editors.go - remove timestamps from legacy query, add published
Fix books.go - isbn_number, link_url→url, add published
Fix links.go - legacy uses title→name, infer type from URL
Handle skills - no legacy table exists, extract from item.skills only
Build and test full migration pipeline
